org.alicebot.ab

Interface AIMLProcessorExtension

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PCAIMLProcessorExtension

    public interface AIMLProcessorExtension
    The interface needed to implement AIML Extension A class implementing AIMLProcessorExtension should return a Set of tag names and provide a function to recursively evaluate the XML parse tree for each node associated with a new tag.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> extensionTagSet()
      provide the AIMLProcessor with a list of extension tag names.
      java.lang.String recursEval(org.w3c.dom.Node node, ParseState ps)
      recursively evaluate AIML from a node corresponding an extension tag

        recursively evaluate AIML from a node corresponding an extension tag
